Though not as tough as their more numerous cultist brethren,  Dark Acolytes are every bit as zealous, using arcane lore and forbidden knowledge to attack the Heroes.

6x Enemies, Cards, Rules, and Mission

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Crimson Hand Dread Inquisitors Enemy Pack
Description:
The Dread Inquisitors are dark masters of pestilence in the Order of the Crimson Hand! They wield vile plagues and iron man-catchers to corrupt and subdue any that would stand in the way of their sinister plans!

Includes 6 Enemies, Cards and Rules.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Cuyuyuy
Description:
Cuyuyuy simulates a wheel of fortune. There are 12 numbered box cards, arranged in a circle. A random guinea pig is placed on the box with its number. 
In each turn, each player places a card from their personal deck on one of the boxes. Cards are simultaneously revealed, and the numbers are added up. The guinea pig runs around the wheel to cover that distance. If it lands on a player's card, that player claims the guinea pig; if not, a new set of cards is added. First player to gain three guinea pigs is the winner. Players should remember which cards have been played to get a better shot at influencing the outcome.

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Gates of Valhalla – Thunderforged Titan XXL Enemy
Description:
Forged by the gods of the Underworld, with a heart of thunder the fury of lightning, these Titans rise up from their rocky slumber to unleash destruction on the world of mortal men.

The Thunder Forged Titan is a massive XXL boss Enemy. We wanted to make sure his model left no question that he deserved to be called a Titan, so he is BIG!

1 XXL Enemy, Cards, Rules and Mission.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Gates of Valhalla – XL Fire Giant Alternative Enemy Pack
Description:
The raging Fire Giants of Muspelheim have broken the barriers between worlds and now sweep through the Norse Lands, setting fire to the forests and cracking the very ground asunder with their mighty Charred Clubs!

This alternate Enemy set features 5 new Threat cards to add Fire Giants to your games, 1 new Enemy Record Sheet with new stats and abilities, and 1 additional XL Frost Giant model that can be painted to represent this new Enemy variant. The Threat Cards include a new HIGH Threat to face a Lesser Fire Giant, a Caverns of Cynder OtherWorld Threat, as well as new EPIC Threats for the Fire Giant.

1 XL Enemy, Cards, and Rules

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Swamp Stingers Enemy Pack
Description:
Gliding across the swampy marsh of Jargono, these giant insects feed on man and beast alike! They are so powerful, that Heroes can be grabbed and carried off by Swamp Stingers!

Includes 3 Large Enemies, Cards and Rules.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Jaguar Warrior Hero Pack
Description:
The Jaguar Warriors are elite soldiers in the Aztec Empire, adorned with the skins and claws of the fearsome and cunning jungle cats to imbue them with the spirit of the Jaguar in combat. Fighting with spears, shields, and tribal swords edged with obsidian blade fragments, these disciplined warriors go to war with the same cunning, ferocity, and skill as the deadly stalking predators they emulate.

This new Aztec-themed Hero Pack contains all of the cards, Hero Character Sheet, Upgrade Chart, and rules needed to play a Jaguar Warrior Hero in your games of Shadows of Brimstone, including 2 high detail plastic models to represent the Male and Female versions of the Hero Class. Jaguar Warrior Heroes are designed with several distinct playstyles (such as the Starting Upgrade option to be an Eagle Warrior instead). This gives players the option of running an Aztec-themed Hero Party with multiple Jaguar Warriors and Blood Priestess Heroes (the other Aztec-themed Hero Class), or joining the Conquistadors in the war against the Serpentmen.

Includes 2 Heroes, Cards, and Rules

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Valley of the Serpent Kings – Carnivorous Plants Multi-Pack
Description:
With writhing vines and snapping jaws, the Carnivorous Plants of Jargono are legendary for any lucky enough to escape their clutches alive! The dark swamps and lush jungle valleys of Jargono are teeming with countless forms of these deadly flora, lying in wait for those foolish enough to wander too close.

This miniature set features 4 new Jargono OtherWorld Threat cards representing Blood Snappers and Den'oola Man Eaters, as well as 12 additional Carnivorous Plant models that can be painted to represent these two new Enemy variants. Exploring the inhospitable Swamps of Jargono just got a little more deadly.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Setaris Ravagers Enemy Pack
Description:
Retail Description
The Setaris Kitewings are a ruthless alien civilization, bent on conquest and devastation. A reptilian species with large leathery wings, they descend from above to rain death upon their foes. Often acting in small bands of space pirates known as Ravager Enclaves, these cunning raiders have mastered Hit-and-Run attacks to strike quickly and without warning. Not known for taking prisoners, it is said that the Setaris have a habit of feeding on the dead.

This Enemy Pack contains everything you need to add these vicious alien Enemies to your games of Shadows of Brimstone.

Contains:
6 x Setaris Ravagers
6 x 30mm Bases
1 x Large Enemy Record Sheet
13 x Game Cards
1 x Die-Cut Counter Sheet

Kickstarter Description
The Setaris Ravagers are a savage group of sinister aliens that descend from the skies on their leathery wings, blasting away at any who would stand before the might of their conquest! Originally introduced in the Conquest of Planet Earth Board Game (similar to their rivals, the Trun), the Setaris Kitewings are a group of raiders that travel from world to world, attacking without warning to collect raw materials and ‘food’ for their nomadic fleet of Kraken Ships. The Setaris Ravagers can be found in several OtherWorlds (Targa, Jargono, Blasted Wastes, Derelict Ship, Trederra, and more). They have vicious talons as well as powerful energy weapons, Snap Firing at Heroes as they make their Hit and Run attacks.

Includes 6 Setaris Ravagers, Cards, and Rules

During the Shadows of Brimstone Adventures Kickstarter campaign, part of the Social Media Stretch Goals with the Feathered Serpents of Kotak.

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Trederran MK IIs 'Lightning' Scout Tank XXL Enemy
Description:
Feared across the battlefields of Trederra, the Mk IIs "Lightning' Scout Tank rolls over trenches and rumbles down burnt out streets in search of the enemy. Grinding gears and plumes of black smoke bellow from the steel beast as it scouts ahead of an armored column, or lends its deadly firepower as infantry support to the Legionnaires. Though smaller than most of the massive tanks of Trederra, the Lightning is more maneuverable, and fueled by Dark Stone, it still packs a punch. It is one of the only Tanks routinely used for excursions into OtherWorlds when the mission calls for overwhelming fire support.

And with it, 2 extra Tank themed Missions have also been added to the Kickstarter-Exclusive Trederran Strike Team Expansion, allowing your Strike Team to go on a Mission to escort the Tank into hostile territory, or attempt to fight your way to the location of a Tank that is pinned down to help secure it, or at least rescue the crew!

Includes 1 XXL Enemy, Cards, Rules, and 2 new Missions.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Saboteur: 15 Jahre Jubiläums-Sticker
Description:
Postcard with 11 reusable stickers that can be stuck on the original saboteuer cards.
How to use the stickers with Saboteur.

After each round, the winners choose a sticker and stick it on a suitable card. In the following rounds of this or other games, the function of the card is changed to the new rules.

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Trun Gladiators Enemy Pack
Description:
The tribal warrior race of Trun are known as powerful hunters and cunning predators. Stripping away their usual heavy armor and arsenal of guns, Trun Gladiators fight with twin swords to cut down their prey in brutal hand-to-hand combat!

Includes 3 Large Enemies, Cards and Rules.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Sparsi! A Guerra dos Grãos
Description: Sparsi! is a nanogame played on a business card size map.  Different grains can be used as playing pieces (not included). Players take turns placing one of their pieces on the map, trying to get majorities in the four landscape types. Volcanoes yield negative points, but can secure majorities, gold mines yield bonus points, and if you place a grain on the raft, you win all ties. The player with the highest score when all grain has been placed is the winner.

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Archive Guardian and Archive Towers Enemy Pack
Description:
These massive robotic Guardians awaken from their ancient slumber when intruders are detected within the Library Archives deep within the ancient city of the Targa Plateau. Armed with powerful Shockwave and Cryo Cannons, Guardians of the Archive are a terrifying foe to face.

This new kind of Guardian from Targa is heavily armed with ranged weapons to defend the sprawling chambers of the Library Archive.

1 XL Archive Guardian Enemy, 3 Archive Tower Terrain Hazard miniatures, Cards and Rules.

—description from the publisher

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Serpent King on Ki'tarri Beast XXL Enemy
Description:
The Serpent Kings rule over the temples of the Sacred Valley, leading their armies to war from atop massive flying Kitarr'i Beasts. The Serpent King on Kitarr'i Beast is perhaps the most epic creature miniature in all of Shadows of Brimstone to date. This monstrous winged beast boasts an outrageous wingspan. With powerful, beating wings and long, razor-toothed jaws, the Kitarr'i Beast can chomp through even the toughest Heroes that stray too close. Atop this deadly mount, the mighty Serpent King rides, coiled around his horned saddle, and commanding the vast Serpentmen armies of his Tribe. The Serpent King wields ancient Tribal Relics and signals Battle Formations from on high, as he crushes the tribe's foes with each swing of his brutal Dark Stone sword.

Includes 1 XXL Enemy, Cards, Rules and Mission.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Valley of the Serpent Kings – Children of the Mountain Enemy Pack
Description:
The Children of the Mountain are nightmarish creatures spoken of in legend, but few actually encounter them and live to talk about it! They were once human, but were mummified and then re-animated by dark magik! They possess powerful Grave Goods, items that they were entombed with, that now give them terrifying abilities in their life beyond death.

Includes 6 Enemies, Cards and Rules.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Cobarri Headhunters Mission Pack
Description:
Striking from the shadows, the Cobarri Headhunters surround their prey, cutting them down with brutal efficiency. With flared hoods and forked tongue, the Cobarri can spit venom in the face of their foes, deflecting blows with their ornate shields and slicing through the toughest armor using swords lined with volcanic Dark Stone, chipped to a razor's edge. Mercenary warriors, the Cobarri Headhunters do not belong to any one Tribe, but sell their swords for gold and glory in the name of Ke'Ke Na, the Serpent God of Death!

This Mission Pack introduces the Cobarri Headhunters of Jargono. With 4 new Missions that form a short story campaign, a new Objective Room Map Tile, a host of new cards including Threats, Artifacts, Enemy Traits, Darkness, and more, as well as the Enemy Record Sheet, Rules, and 6 Cobarri Headhunter models, this Mission Pack is an exciting addition to the Swamps of Jargono and your games of Shadows of Brimstone.

-description from publisher's website

Name: Shadows of Brimstone: Prometheon Defenders Mission Pack
Description:
The frozen halls and ancient archives of the Targa Plateau are watched over by more than just lumbering Guardians and robotic Custodians. As the Library awakens, and the systems blink back to life, the Prometheon Defenders emerge from their ancient slumber to stalk the halls once more, eradicating intruders and setting out on sinister missions by order of the Archive Intelligence. Armed with the arcane Prometheus Staff, these four-armed robotic predators tower over their foes, sweeping aside all opposition up close while firing deadly energy blasts to disintegrate those that try to flee. Protectors of the Library, the Prometheon Defenders are a robotic nightmare of cold calculation and ruthless perfection.

This Mission Pack introduces the Prometheon Defenders of the Targa Plateau. With 4 new Missions that form a short story campaign, a new Objective Room Map Tile, a host of new cards including Threats, Artifacts, Enemy Traits, Darkness, and more, as well as the Enemy Record Sheet, Rules, and 6 Large Prometheon Defender models, this Mission Pack is an exciting addition to the Targa Plateau and your games of Shadows of Brimstone.

-description from publisher's website

Name: The Hare and the Tortoise, the Fox and the Snail
Description:
The objective of the game is to be the first to reach the end of the track (106 spaces). Players choose to be either a hare, a tortoise, a fox, or a snail. Each animal has a custom dice. The tortoise and snail each uses a normal six-sided dice. The hare's dice has three rests and three sevens. The fox's dices has two rests, two sevens, a ten, and a minus three.

—user summary
